meanings.sent1: The pukiest smell in the kitchen made me feel sick.
meanings.sent2: That old milk was the pukiest thing I've ever smelled.
meanings.sent3: The pukiest food combination I ever tried was pickles and ice cream.
meanings.sent4: The roller coaster ride was like a pukiest adventure through twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The pukiest taste of spoiled milk lingered in my mouth for hours.

meanings.definition: in a manner that is most likely to cause vomiting
meanings.sent1: She looked at the moldy sandwich pukiest and quickly turned away.
meanings.sent2: He ate the expired yogurt pukiest, hoping it wouldn't make him sick.
meanings.sent3: The baby giggled pukiest after tasting the bitter medicine.
meanings.sent4: The roller coaster spun pukiest, making everyone feel queasy.
meanings.sent5: The smell of rotten eggs hit me pukiest as I opened the fridge.

meanings.definition: the most vomit-inducing thing or situation
meanings.sent1: The pukiest scene in the movie was when the character got sick.
meanings.sent2: The garbage can was filled with the pukiest leftovers from last week.
meanings.sent3: The prank was a pukiest joke that made everyone gag.
meanings.sent4: The haunted house had the pukiest decorations to scare visitors.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the medicine was the pukiest thing she had ever experienced.
